title: Even if you ask twice answer remains same Can we wash pure clothes with impure ones? assim al hakeem
transcript: from southallah so Sheikh I've already asked this question on website but for further verification if I watch impure close shake with pure ones in the washing machine and after one rinsing cycle I put them in the spinner which moves and small pipe also puts water small pipe and it moves continuously in that with small pipe continually putting water and detergent water is drained and it dries also in that so Shake is that enough to purify what was the answer on the website yes the same answer applies
